import React, { Component, Fragment } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import jQuery from 'jquery' import { Link, BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Switch, withRouter, HashRouter, Redirect } from 'react-router-dom' import DatePicker from "react-datepicker"; import "react-datepicker/dist/react-datepicker.css"; import { RadioGroup, Radio } from 'react-radio-group' class ExplApprenant extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { apprenantId: '', prenom: '', nom: '', selectedType: 'CIN', numSelonType: '', nationalite: '', dateDelivSelonType: '', dateNaissance: '', email: '', selectedGender: 'Masculin', tel: '', adresseTun: '', selectedFormation: '', nomNiveau: '', selectedGroupe: '', imgDiplScol: '', diplScol: null, imgCin: '', pathCin: null, imgVerso: '', imageVerso: null, imgExtNaiss: '', extNaiss: null, imgReglInt: '', reglInt: null, nomNiveau:'' } } componentDidMount() { if (JSON.parse((localStorage.getItem('userPermissions'))) != null) { var idApprenant = this.props.location.state.idApprenant; axios.get(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL + 'Back_mediatraining/GetApprById.php?id=' + idApprenant).then(res => { console.log(res) this.setState({ apprenantId: res.data.idEleve, prenom: res.data.prenom, nom: res.data.nom, selectedType: res.data.type, numSelonType: res.data.numero, nationalite: res.data.nationalite, dateNaissance: res.data.naissance, adresseTun: res.data.adresseTun, email: res.data.email, selectedGender: res.data.sex, tel: res.data.tel, selectedFormation: res.data.formation, nomNiveau: res.data.nomNiveau, selectedGroupe: res.data.groupe, imgDiplScol: res.data.diplScol, imgCin: res.data.cinPath, imgVerso: res.data.photo, imgExtNaiss: res.data.extNaiss, imgReglInt: res.data.reglInt, nomNiveau:res.data.nomNiveau }) }) } else { document.location = '/' } } render() { return (

); } } export default withRouter(ExplApprenant);
